description: Extracts structured data from deep_summarization engine output: thesis architecture, chapter argument map, conceptual moves, evidence patterns, rhetorical strategies, foregrounding/suppression, conceptual vocabulary, and downstream utility.

llm_extraction_schema.thesis_architecture: string (2-4 paragraphs describing the load-bearing argumentative structure)

chapter_argument_map.argument: string (the argument advanced or work done)

conceptual_moves.how_deployed: string (how and where this move is deployed in the text)

suppressed.how_suppressed: string (techniques of suppression — silence, brief mention, dismissal)
suppressed.what_this_conceals: string (what the suppression conceals or enables)

downstream_utility.key_value_pairs: object — keys are downstream engine names or analysis types, values describe what this summarization enables for them

source: Created for genealogy_tp_deep_summary view — Phase 0.5 deep text profiling
